page.name: Share Editing Strategies with LearnersÂ
page.content:
Many new writers do not understand that editing is a process. They will need help understanding that editing is part of the writing process. You can encourage learners to become active editors by asking them to: 

  • Re-read the paragraph or sentence they are writing (silently or out loud)
  • Make sure they understand the meaning of each word they have included 
  • Find more information on the topic they are writing about (ask someone for help, find references, search online) 
  • Ask someone else to read a section 
  • Use headings in the text to help orient and provide clarification  

Additional Resource: IRIS Center, Monitoring Comprehension
